html.p: You must fight the thief and his thug associate together. BEGIN BATTLE
If you want to break off combat and run away at any time, you may do so - leaving all your gold in the hands of the robbers.

text.p: Click here if you want to go to Lobster Wharf or here if you want to head for Weaver Gate.
You regain your stolen money, and the thief has an extra 4 Gold Pieces in a leather pouch. Test your Luck again!

successful.p: You are Lucky, you can leave the scene and make for Lobster Wharf or Weaver Gate.

unsuccessful.p: You are Unlucky, some militiamen arrive, click here.
